description:
Natsume Ritsu is the Cabinet Secretariat of National Security Agency information team. She went to the same university as http://anidb.net/ch87281 [Shindou] and http://anidb.net/ch87276 [Asano]. She is in love with Shindou, but realizes that she "isn`t capable enough to handle him" so she steps back.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Natsume Ritsu
